adDetails: ARE YOU SATISFIED WITH YOUR DIET? MOST LIKELY NOT! WANT TO LOSE WEIGHT AND TRANSFORM YOUR BODY EATING WHATEVER YOU WANT? READ BELOW! NO NONSENSE! JUST HARD WORK AND DEDICATION! BUILD YOUR IDEAL BODY AND OVERALL CONFIDENCE. CHANGE YOUR LIFE TODAY! **FAT BURNING **BUILD MUSCLE **HIIT TRAINING **STRENGTH TRAINING **ENDURANCE TRAINING I am a 25 yr old bjj/mma/exercise fanatic. I have a real passion for fitness and helping people change their lives! Unfortunately, due to an increase in my work and clientele along with my training schedule I can now only offer an online training program. With this I offer 4, 8, and 10 week routines that I will give you to do on your own along with a detailed macronutrient breakdown of your daily food intake so you can MAXIMIZE results for a FRACTION OF THE PRICE. All of which is PERSONALIZED to meet both your fitness level and fitness goals. During this time I will be there for you to contact whenever you need, to assist with any questions or concerns you may have. You give me an amount of weight you want to lose and I can make it happen! ANYONE CAN PROMISE THE WORLD! ONLY FEW CAN DELIVER! Losing weight is all numbers, simple math; calories in - calories out. I have been doing this for about two years now and it has resulted in a lot of happy clients. All of which love my approach and push. *ALL WITH FLEXIBLE DIETING!! Want to know how you can Lose weight eating Pop Tarts, Pizza, Cheeseburgers, Cookies etc.?? (within certain guidelines) Contact me and find out! THIS MAKES DIETING SUPER EASY AND HELPS KEEP YOU SANE DURING YOUR EXERCISE JOURNEY!! I believe in STRICT dieting, NOT RESTRICTED DIETING!! Restricting yourself from the foods you love almost always ends very badly! Learn how to stay fit for life eating the foods you love!! Most Personal Trainers offer this for hundreds and even thousands of dollars. I can personally guarantee that you cannot beat my prices or my results! I am not in this to break your wallet, I am here to help. If you give me 100%, I will give you the same. I love changing peoples lives for the better. Lets change yours!! Just send me a text and I will respond as promptly as possible. My number is show contact info. I welcome any opportunity to further discuss any questions you may have and look forward to hearing from you.
